archimate:Resource.name: Process Container/Process Engine
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB provides an environment to manage the execution and flow of business processes, and to manage the interaction of humans with business processes. It is also is responsible for managing the instances of running processes and their context.

properties.value: This ABB provides an environment to manage the execution and flow of business processes, and to manage the interaction of humans with business processes. It is also is responsible for managing the instances of running processes and their context.
